support.title: Support & Contact
support.contactDescription: If you have any questions or requests, please feel free to contact us at the email address below.
support.responseTime: We typically respond within 2-3 business days.

faq1.question: How do I register as a couple?
faq1.answer: Create an invitation link in the app and share it with your partner. When they open the app through the link, you'll be automatically registered as a couple.

faq2.question: Who pays for the subscription?
faq2.answer: Either partner can pay, and it covers both of you. Payment status is not shown to your partner.

faq3.question: Who can see my letters?
faq3.answer: Letters are only delivered to your partner. They're only shown to other users if you choose to make them public (anonymously).

faq4.question: How do I delete my account?
faq4.answer: Select 'Delete Account' in the app settings. All your data will be permanently deleted.
